summary: THE ENTRY STEPS INTO MY FIFTH WHEEL TRAILER HAD A FAILURE.  THE RIVET IN THE SECOND STEP FROM THE BOTTOM BROKE WHEN STEPPED ON, ALLOWING IT TO COLLAPSE ON ONE SIDE. I HAVE TEMPORARILY REPAIRED THE STEP WITH A BOLT.  I ALSO CONTACTED KEYSTONE ON THE DATE OF THIS COMPLAINT ONLY TO BE TOLD MY VIN WAS NOT WITHIN THE RECALL SCOPE EVEN THOUGH THE STEP ASSEMBLY IS MADE BY HICKORY SPRINGS.  *TR
